alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 8:25PM CDT until March 31 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR FAYETTE COUNTY... At 824 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ramsey to near Vandalia to near Mulberry Grove, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Greenville AWOS measured a 67 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Brownstown, Wrights Corner and St. Elmo. This also includes Ramsey Lake State Park. This includes Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 61 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
